long_description: Designed specifically for self massage and muscle regeneration, the 13 in. GoFit Extreme Massage Roller targets muscle pain caused by exercise and everyday activities. Uses include stretching and light or deep tissue massage. Egg-crate design emulates massage to work on deep-tissue trigger points and help restore flexibility. Durable closed-cell foam roller with a rigid PVC hollow core has an outside diameter of 6 in. (16cm) and an inside diameter of 4 in. (11cm). The GoFit Extreme Massage Roller comes with a training manual.
short_description: Designed specifically for self massage and muscle regeneration, the 13 in. GoFit Extreme Massage Roller targets muscle pain caused by exercise and everyday activities.
